attributes.action: Remove local Health Service control and get back to National Health Service
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We have moved from being a National Health Service to a Regional Health Service.  Money poured into the 'NHS' is being squandered on leadership and associated costs.  If we reverted back to local hospitals managed by Medical Personnel and funding controlled by central government then at least 85% would be spent on a Health Service instead of what looks like 55%.  I aknowledge that someone needs to manage our hospitals but accountants are not the right people.  Also if we can not revert to a NHS, cut down the number of PCT, remove some non medical officers and replace them with medical staff,
